page.title: 15EDUCATION(Continued)
page.content: Here are the answers we were given from the children at Farnham Common First School.To see the question see page 14: 1.Cartoons,Rainbow,Cover-up. 2.Fruit,Spaghetti,Fish and Chips etc. 3.Hopscotch,Â£Mysteries',Football. 4.Maths,English and Handwriting. 5.Doctor,Nurse,Mum,Engineer,Film star. 6.Computer,Rocking Horse,Doll,Teddy. 7.Robin Hood,Butterflies,Alice stories. 8.Sticker collecting,Sports,Soaps. -------- Older children-11,12 years-Games played in school. 1.Organised-football,netball,cricket, tennis(table,padder) 2.Playground-football,netball,skipping, "bulldog"(form of catch), "tipsies"(game with 1p's), toy cars,snowballs,slides.
